question:
You have just read an article in an international travel magazine which contained some information about your town that is incorrect.

Write a letter to the editor of the magazine. In your letter:correct the information in the articleexplain why it is important for the magazine to give correct informationsuggest what the magazine should do about this situation
text: I am writing this letter to express my concern about the wrong piece of information which is printed in your newspaper.

Recently, I have been gone through an incorrect piece of news in the cutting of your magazine which said about the opening of the new amusement park in the town. I just wanted to bring in your knowledge that its construction is not completed yet and it is not open to the public till now due to some legal issues.

Due to this wrong piece of information, people along with their families are visiting our area daily which not only wastes their time and efforts but also puts a burden to bear the fuel cost. Moreover, it will negatively affect the reliability and credibility of your paper.
You are requested to correct it and republished the article so that folks will not be in any doubt of it.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
